# Terms of Service

You are welcome to use Octofile file transfer tool (the Octofile, theSoftware) and you should read and comply with the Octofile Terms of Service ( (the Terms, the Terms of Service).

By starting to use the Software in any other way, you will be deemed to be tacitly agreeing to be bound by these Terms of Service. The Software reserves the right to modify these Terms of Use as necessary. You may review the most current version of these Terms of Service on the relevant service page. If you continue to use the Software after a change in these Terms, you will be deemed to have accepted the changed Terms.

If you do not have full civil capacity due to age, intelligence or other factors, please read and judge whether you agree to these Terms with your legal guardian.

If you are using any version of the Software and have read any version of these Terms at any place and at any time, and continue to use the Software, you agree to these Terms.

References to third-party brands and logos in these Terms or in the Online Storage Service are textual references and do not relate to brands or trademarks.

Access to these Terms is available at https://www.octofile.com/terms-of-service.html

# 1. Scope of the article

The contents of these Terms of Use, including but not limited to the following agreements, rules, and specifications related to the Software, shall be an integral part of these Terms of Use and constitute a unified whole once the aforementioned contents are officially published.

# 2. About the Software

This software refers to the Octofile file transfer tool developed by the developer of Octofile and authorized to be purchased, downloaded, installed and used by the user in accordance with these Terms of Use and other related agreements and rules.

Otherwise, you may not be able to use the Octofile File Transfer Tool from any other source. You shall be solely responsible for any legal disputes or infringement by third parties arising out of your access to, or use of, a copy of any version of the Software.

You may not take or make a copy of the Software for your own personal use through technical means.

All other rights not expressly granted in this section and other sections of these Terms of Service are reserved by the developer of the Software.

# 3. Update of the Software

In order to improve the user experience or service security, to ensure functional consistency, to comply with local laws and regulations, to adapt to changes in application policy and other purposes, the developer has the right to update this software, or change some of the software's functional effects. For any reason, you should not seek illegal means to crack the historical version of the software that is no longer available for download in the above channels, otherwise you shall be responsible for any legal disputes or infringement by third parties.

# 4. User Code of Conduct

Octofile will use commercially reasonable efforts to ensure the security of your data stored in the Software, but cannot guarantee the security of such data. If you import any data, including but not limited to files, into the Software, you should fully evaluate the risks to your privacy or any damage that may be caused by the importation of such data.

In using the Software, you shall comply with relevant laws and regulations, terms of service, rules and regulations, etc., and shall not engage in, or facilitate, any of the following acts, including but not limited to the following.

  • Acts that violate local laws and regulations.
  • Acts that are prohibited by these Terms of Use and other related policies.
  • Reverse engineer, disassemble, decompile, or otherwise attempt to change the function or operation effect of the Software.
  • Use the Software to interfere with or affect other target software that is not authorized to be debugged.
  • Use the cracking tool to bypass the authorization of the Software and use it illegally.

# 5. Be responsible for your own actions

You fully understand and agree that you are responsible for all your own use of the Software, including any content you post and any consequences arising therefrom. If you cause any damage to any third party, or if you suffer damage due to your own actions, you shall be independently responsible.

# 6. Other

Notwithstanding the partial invalidity or unenforceability of these Terms for any reason, the remaining Terms shall remain in effect and shall be binding on the Parties. (concluded)
